title: Twitch Skin? O.o
body:
Which one? Vandal Twitch is out of the picture cuz I missed the sale yesteryday, Pickpocket or Gangster?
In Terms of Particles ofc.

replies.body: I've got most of his skins since i main him. pocket/ vandal  and a very rare whistler village twitch skin :D
I agree wait for the new skin it looks great!!
